means: 没药树脂，没药属[圣经]宝石

word_mean: 伪没药，非洲香胶：几种没药树的芳香树脂，因其相似的外貌和芳香特性，用作没药的搀杂物

sentence.Network_en: The gold of that land is good ; bdellium and cornelians are also to be found there.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一股名比逊河,它曲折流经哈腓拉全境,此地盛产高成色黄金,还有琥珀及红玛瑙.

sentence.Network_en: Now the manna was like coriander seed, and its appearance like that of bdellium.
sentence.Network_cn: 民11:7这吗哪彷佛芫荽子 、 又好像珍珠.

sentence.Network_en: Gen 2:12 And the gold of that land is good: there is bdellium and onyx stone.
sentence.Network_cn: 12并且那地的金子是好的.在那里又有珍珠和红玛瑙.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 关于香水方面专业英语_百度知道 ... BALSAM( 香脂) BDELLIUM( 树胶) BOUQUET( 花束).
航海及海运专业英语词汇(B2) - 商务英语词汇 ... bayou 牛轭湖 bdellium 芳香树胶 beach comber 拍岸浪;滚浪.
BCTV 北京有线电视台bdellium 没药树脂be 是

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Latin from Greek bdellion, of Semitic origin

means.word_mean: 1. aromatic gum resin; similar to myrrh
